channel.title: ★ Project Nibiru ★ Open Beta | Your Last Adventure
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w421/accerado/Niburu_logo_zps2p9naucf.png[/img]
[u][b]About Project Nibiru[/b][/u]
Our #1 goal as a team is to provide an astonishing highly efficient, quality built, content-packed server, that ensures every player satisfaction. We're a player based RSPS, we strongly recommend players, and staff to give us feedback, and suggestions/concepts, this helps shape your world. With a strong economy, lists of things to do, obtainable's to obtain, Quests to accomplish, and unique features that brings the community together. This will definitely be a long-term project, as it already has been. (We've had 4 consecutive months of offline & under the radar development). This project is extremely stable, and should run perfectly fine for anyone. We also have a dedicated Support Team in case anyone has any issues. Right now we are currently under a strict Open-BETA Stage. [B]Nibiru is a non-profit RSPS, founded by the Nibirian Team.[/B] We strive to push out daily updates and constant progression. We've put a lot of time in ensuring this is stabilized, quality-packed, & efficiently developed with access to see Behind the Scenes Development, for those of you who're interested.
[B][U]Note: Everyone who participates in the BETA stage, will receive the following bonuses once we launch:[/B]
An additional two spins a day A unique rank and title, to show off 50m GP.
[u][b]Some Features:[/b][/u] DropID Lookups Client Zooming Sheathing Mod Finder Warrior Guild Rise of Six Fist of Guthix Skill-fu Soul Wars Bank Pins Loyalty system Botany Bay Master Capes Shooting Stars Living Rock Caverns Resource Dungeons Tool-belt Clue Scrolls Clans Loot beams Effigies The Evil Tree Sinkholes Skilling Tasks Boss Raids Cosmetics Globalized Strong Economic System 22 Bosses 13 Mini-Games Penguin Hide n' Seek All skills work - (Construction is under development) Boss Pets Off-Hands Weapons KillStreak system PvM system Player Referral System (Rewards for bringing players in)
[spoiler=Media] [SIZE=3][color=purple]High detail, running extremely stable on a really bad computer & VPS.[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/t89ahe.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/2mcazyx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/k04kmq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/2hn2onq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/30w1fk0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/14kw178.png[/img] [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/731920.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/2dl7vr7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/2ugflf4.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
Links: [URL=http://s15.zetaboards.com/ProjectNibiru/index]Homepage[/URL] - [URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/dh1e8uxfncqpb58/Nibiru.jar?dl=0]Play now[/URL]
[/CENTER]

item.title: ★ Project Nibiru ★ Open Beta | Your Last Adventure
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Any particular reason for Zetaboards? For such a lovely advertisement which even peaked my interest I found it kind of degrading to a certain point. (even though the nostalgia from old RS Clanning was fun for a moment)

Looks like a solid advertisement I will probably get on later and see how it flows.

Commands don’t work and with it being globalized there is no real direction of how to get to places or what to do. Left after about 30 minutes.

Read full topic
item.source: ★ Project Nibiru ★ Open Beta | Your Last Adventure

@FoHammer wrote:

Patch one is almost complete.

Bump, we are trying to attract some attention now that we’re closer to the official launch.
I am keeping my eye open I am going to be looking for a moderator.

item.title: ★ Project Nibiru ★ Open Beta | Your Last Adventure
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

1mS4m:

Great Project matey

Thank you.

It has been a minute since I’ve posted anything on this. I’ve been really wrapped up working on Patch 1.
Baki, the second developer was injured so it’s just been me coding. There’s been a load of updates, which I won’t get into detail
until Patch 1 is released, on the release we will officially launch and be out of the BETA Stage.

Patch 1 Will Include;

[ul][li]All Basic shops added[/li]
[li]More creature locations for training, slayer, and bosses[/li]
[li]We’ve tried to give Nibiru more of it’s own look[/li]
[li]We have approximately 20-25 new interfaces added[/li]
[li]Control Panel has been reworked a bit[/li]
[li]Referral, Recommendation system added[/li]
[li]Globalized things more[/li]
[li]Fixed Construction[/li]
[li]New Teleport System[/li][/ul]

We have a small community from the BETA Stage, we’re really starting to try to expand and grow our community.
Me & my team, are highly dedicated this project is going to grow.

Read full topic
item.source: ★ Project Nibiru ★ Open Beta | Your Last Adventure

item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[CENTER]

About Project Nibiru

Our #1 goal as a team is to provide an astonishing highly efficient, quality built,
content-packed server, that ensures every player satisfaction.
We’re a player based RSPS, we strongly recommend players, and staff to give us feedback,
and suggestions/concepts, this helps shape your world.
With a strong economy, lists of things to do, obtainable’s to obtain,
Quests to accomplish, and unique features that brings the community together.
This will definitely be a long-term project, as it already has been.
(We’ve had 4 consecutive months of offline & under the radar development).
This project is extremely stable, and should run perfectly fine for anyone. We also have a
dedicated Support Team in case anyone has any issues.
Right now we are currently under a strict Open-BETA Stage.
Nibiru is a non-profit RSPS, founded by the Nibirian Team.
We strive to push out daily updates and constant progression.
We’ve put a lot of time in ensuring this is stabilized, quality-packed, & efficiently
developed with access to see Behind the Scenes Development, for those of you who’re interested.

[U]Note: Everyone who participates in the BETA stage, will receive the following bonuses once we launch:

An additional two spins a day
A unique rank and title, to show off
50m GP.

Some Features:
DropID Lookups
